page.title: 14How Traffic Affects our Area
page.content: To the west of our area is{Fletton {Parkway}.It part of the Parkway system which now almost surrounds Peterborough.It makes it easy for people who live in Stanground and Farcet to get to other parts of Peterborough quickly.The Parkway connects with the A.1.and we have a lot of tfaffic coming through Stanground to get onto this road from the east. We stood on the bridge over the Parkway for half an hour and we counted the traffic.We found that there were about twice as many cars as lorries using the road,and that the number of vehicles we saw were about equal in both directions.Most of the lorries we saw were from factories in Peterborough,and several were going to and from the brickyards at{Woodston {and Yaxley.}
